ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectExemptions from and Modifications to Hours of Work Provisions Regulations
PrecisEXEMPTIONS FROM AND MODIFICATIONS TO HOURS OF WORK PROVISIONS REGULATIONS in order to provide exemptions from and modifications to the hours of work provisions for specific classes of employees in the road transportation, postal and courier, marine and grain sectors.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0200 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
